614760.name: Fantasy Grounds - TIMEZERO: Tomorrow BOMB (Savage Worlds)
614760.description:
TIMEZERO: Tomorrow BOMB

Time Emergency! Operations teams Alpha, Beta and Gamma to the briefing room! Prepare to intervene on the timeline!
GRAmels line of time travel adventures takes you through the mists of time to stop chronoterrorists, prevent time anomalies, and save the continuum from obliteration!
This issue contains a single, stand-alone adventure
The Tomorrow Bomb: Kaboom! Second World War. With a single atomic explosion London is wiped out by the Luftwaffe, during the Battle of Britain. But, wait a minute, the Nazis arent supposed to have an atomic bomb! The Operatives are engaged in a race against time (no pun intended) to save the whole of modern history!
Nazis, heartless killers, a trickster from the past, and the shadow of atomic annihilation await the players in this scenario
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Jeannette Jarrar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Savage Worlds Ruleset.
Suggested: TIMEZERO: Operatives Manual
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jeannette Jarrar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
